H0.text: Which Englsih football club play home matches at the Sports Direct Arena. Newcastle United Reserves

H1.text: Which Englsih football club play home matches at the Sports Direct Arena. Gateshead FC

H3.text: Which Englsih football club play home matches at the Sports Direct Arena. NUFC

A4.text: St James' Park is a football stadium in Newcastle upon Tyne, England. It is the home of Newcastle United.

A5.text: Newcastle United have played their home league matches continuously at St James' Park.
